$description: | What does this do? | Requires that a device be registered in Autopilot by uploading a hardware hash before it can be enrolled in Intune. This policy does not apply to users in the Azure AD group "Baseline - Unrestricted Access From Unmanaged Devices And Untrusted Locations" or users with the role "Global Administrator" or "Directory Synchronization Accounts." | | Why should you use this? | This increases security by preventing unauthorized devices from being enrolled into your tenant. | | What is the end-user impact? | High Impact. An administrator must register devices in Autopilot before a general user can enroll it. | | Learn more | N/A |

excludeGroups: ${urn:resource:MSGraph:Groups/Baseline - Unrestricted Access From Unmanaged Devices And Untrusted Locations?$id}
